com.homework.ellaeinarsen.hangmanee

Class Hangman

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.homework.ellaeinarsen.hangmanee.Hangman

  • public class Hangman
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Hangman is used to handle Hangman game data and operations that are possible in the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NUMBER_OF_TRIES
      Maximal amount of number of tries that player can have when game begins.
      static java.util.Random random
      Variable random is used to hold reference to object of class Random that is used to choose random word from word list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hangman()
      Creates Hangman game object with default list of wordList, initializes object array lists variables of correctly and wrongly guessed letters with zero elements.

    • Field Detail

      • NUMBER_OF_TRIES

        public static final int NUMBER_OF_TRIES
        Maximal amount of number of tries that player can have when game begins.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • random

        public static java.util.Random random
        Variable random is used to hold reference to object of class Random that is used to choose random word from word list.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hangman

        public Hangman()
        Creates Hangman game object with default list of wordList, initializes object array lists variables of correctly and wrongly guessed letters with zero elements. A default list of words is also assigned to the new object. Then calls method chooseRandomWord that assigns random word from the list of wordList to be the game word and does necessary cleaning and assignments of object variables for new game.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseRandomWord

        public void chooseRandomWord()
        Method chooseRandomWord assigns a random word from wordList to be the word used in Hangman game instance. Choice is generated with help of Random class which generates random integer which represents one of the words in array list wordList. This method also resets values of wrongly guessed letters, correctly guessed letters, remaining tries and revealed letters for Hangman object as these are interconnected in game logic.

      • makeAGuess

        public void makeAGuess(char letter)
        Method makeAGuess takes a letter (character) as input and runs necessary methods to check if the letter has been used or not. If the letter has already been used (wrongly or correctly) then nothing happens. If the letter has not been used then method runs a check if that letter is one of letters in game word. If that is not the case then it is added to used letters and remaining tries are decreased by one. If the letter has not been used yet and it matches one (or more) letters in the game word then it is added to correctly used letters.
        Parameters:
        letter - that is to be checked by game

      • getHiddenWord

        public java.lang.String getHiddenWord()
        Method getHiddenWord returns string variable that represent game word with all guessed letters revealed and with not yet guessed letters replaced by "-" sign.
        Returns:
        string containing game word with all not guessed letters replaced by -

      • hasLost

        public boolean hasLost()
        If Hangman object has no tries remaining left (0) then this method returns true, else false.
        Returns:
        boolean value true if there are no more tries left, else false

      • hasWon

        public boolean hasWon()
        This method checks if all letters in game word has been guessed correctly and returns true if it is the case, else false.
        Returns:
        true if game word has been guessed, else false

      • hasUsedLetter

        public boolean hasUsedLetter(char letter)
        Method hasUsedLetter checks if the entered character parameter has already been used and saved in respective array list variables. Method returns true if the letter has been used, else false.
        Parameters:
        letter - is letter to be checked if used
        Returns:
        true or false boolean value depending on if the parameter letter has been already used

      • getGameWord

        public java.lang.String getGameWord()
        Method returns the current game word in Hangman class object.
        Returns:
        game word that is to be guessed by player

      • getTries

        public int getTries()
        Method getTries returns integer number of tries (guess chances) left.
        Returns:
        number of tries left

      • getWrongLetters

        public java.lang.String getWrongLetters()
        Method getWrongLetters goes through array list of wrongly guessed characters(letters) and returns them as one string variable where all letters are separated by comma.
        Returns:
        string variable containing all wrongly guessed letters

      • saveGameState

        public void saveGameState(SharedPreferences sh)
        Method saveGameState saves all needed Hangman object information in Shared Preferences object referencing to a file. This method fetches the important data from actual object that was used to call method and does necessary conversions to data and saves that data in the file in assigned key-value pairs containing both String and String Set values.
        Parameters:
        sh - is reference to SharedPreferences object that is assigned to write to a file

      • loadGameState

        public void loadGameState(SharedPreferences sh)
        Method loadGameState updates existing objects data with loaded data from file referenced by SharedPreferences attribute. This method loads data only if there are existent, corresponding Key-value pairs saved in SharedPreference file. A check for saved state key-value pair is done and if it is not existent in a file then no data will be read. If this key-value pair exists and is set as true then loading of game data will be attempted.
        Parameters:
        sh - reference to object of SharedPreferences class that is linked to a file from which data will be read

      • removeSavedState

        public static void removeSavedState(SharedPreferences sh)
        Method removeSavedState takes Shared Preferences object with assigned to it file and removes any key-value pairs that have same names as those corresponding to Hangman class. Data being removed is not object specific but it is the data saved in file.
        Parameters:
        sh - is Shared Preferences object reference to read file with

      • toLowerCaseLetter

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> toLowerCaseLetter(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arrayList)
        Method toLowerCaseLetter takes in array list of String values as parameter and returns that array list with every String element changed to lower case.
        Parameters:
        arrayList - list containing String values
        Returns:
        array list containing String elements with lower case

      • toLowerCaseLetter

        public static char toLowerCaseLetter(char c)
        Method toLowerCaseLetter takes character parameter and if it represents an upper case letter then it returns that character turned to lower case.
        Parameters:
        c - a letter (character) to be changed from upper to lower case
        Returns:
        same letter but in lower case

      • charAListToStringSet

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> charAListToStringSet(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> charList)
        Method charAListToStringSet converts Array List of Characters to a Set of Strings and returns it.
        Parameters:
        charList - is ArrayList of Characters
        Returns:
        a Set of String with same elements as the ones in the list given in parameter

      • stringSetToCharAList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> stringSetToCharAList(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> set)
        Method stringSetToCharAList takes a Set of String and returns a converted version of it as an Array List of Characters.
        Parameters:
        set - is Set of String to be converted
        Returns:
        an Array List of String containing corresponding Character elements to ones in param
